definitions.definition: A French type of small gateau or sponge cake , often shaped like an elongated scallop shell.
Something which brings back a memory ; a source of nostalgia or evocative memories.

main_definition: A French type of small gateau or sponge cake , often shaped like an elongated scallop shell.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Something which brings back a memory ; a source of nostalgia or evocative memories.
